Xbmtopbm User Manual(0)                 Xbmtopbm User Manual(0)



Table Of Contents


NAME
       xbmtopbm - convert an X11 or X10 bitmap to a PBM image


SYNOPSIS
       xbmtopbm

       [bitmapfile]


DESCRIPTION
       This program is part of Netpbm(1).

       xbmtopbm  reads  an  X11 or X10 bitmap as input and pro-
       duces a PBM image as output.


SEE ALSO
       pbmtoxbm(1), pbmtox10bm(1), pbm(1)


AUTHOR
       Copyright (C) 1988 by Jef Poskanzer.



netpbm documentation     31 August 1988 Xbmtopbm User Manual(0)
